name: Breaded Brussels Sprouts on pasta with tomato basil sauce
description: Breaded Brussels sprouts are a perfect topping for this simple pasta dish
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup of thin rice flakes ground coarsely
1/2 teaspoon dried basil or spice mix of choice
1/4 teaspoon cayenne or black pepper or to taste
8  Brussels sprouts (stems cut, halved and outer leaves removed.)
2 cups of any pasta of choice
3-4 Tablespoons of chopped fresh basil leaves

itemListElement.text: Mix all the ingredients, except BSprouts, to get a thick pasty mix. Let sit for a minute. Then coat halved brussels sprouts with it. The mixture is not very sticky, so just press on both sides to cover as much as you can. (See ready for baking picture above) Adjust water and chickpea flour if needed.
itemListElement.name: Mix all the ingredients, except BSprouts, to get a thick pasty mix. Let sit for a minute. Then coat halved brussels sprouts with it. The mixture is not very sticky, so just press on both sides to cover as much as you can. (See ready for baking picture above) Adjust water and chickpea flour if needed.

itemListElement.text: Place on parchment with halved side up.
itemListElement.name: Place on parchment with halved side up.

itemListElement.text: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 20-25 minutes until the batter is dry and some outer leaves start to brown.
itemListElement.name: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 20-25 minutes until the batter is dry and some outer leaves start to brown.

itemListElement.text: Prepare 2 cups of any pasta of choice. Add tomato basil sauce and toss. You can also use any pesto sauce with it.
itemListElement.name: Prepare 2 cups of any pasta of choice. Add tomato basil sauce and toss. You can also use any pesto sauce with it.

itemListElement.text: Top with breaded brussels sprouts, nutritional yeast(optional) and chopped fresh basil.
itemListElement.name: Top with breaded brussels sprouts, nutritional yeast(optional) and chopped fresh basil.

itemListElement.text: Add 1 teaspoon of olive oil in pan, add in 3 cloves of garlic finely chopped.
itemListElement.name: Add 1 teaspoon of olive oil in pan, add in 3 cloves of garlic finely chopped.

itemListElement.text: Cook for 1 minute on medium heat.
itemListElement.name: Cook for 1 minute on medium heat.

itemListElement.text: Add 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes and 3 medium tomatoes finely chopped.
itemListElement.name: Add 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes and 3 medium tomatoes finely chopped.

itemListElement.text: Add in 3-4 Tablespoons of chopped fresh basil leaves or a teaspoon of dried basil and salt to taste(1/2 teaspoon).
itemListElement.name: Add in 3-4 Tablespoons of chopped fresh basil leaves or a teaspoon of dried basil and salt to taste(1/2 teaspoon).

itemListElement.text: Mix well and cook for another 5 minutes until the tomatoes are mushy.
itemListElement.name: Mix well and cook for another 5 minutes until the tomatoes are mushy.
